tool_description: Do simple transformations on images like resize, crop, optimize, stitch gifs and more features coming soon!
name: SimpleTransform
title: SimpleTransform

api_list.name: Hello World
api_list.description: Return a simple hello world so we know we're live
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simpletransform.p.rapidapi.com/hello_world"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simpletransform.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://simpletransform.p.rapidapi.com/hello_world"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simpletransform.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
